title: Derek Hough Thanks Kenny Ortega For 'Dirty Dancing' Choreography After 'DWTS' Routine With Bindi Irwin
text: Derek Hough Thanks Kenny Ortega For 'Dirty Dancing' Choreography After 'DWTS' Routine With Bindi Irwin Thursday, 22 October 2015 (11 minutes ago) Derek Hough lifts Bindi Irwin high in this shot from Dancing With The Stars on Monday night (October 20). Team Crikey pulled off a flawless re-creation of Dirty Dancing‘s ending dance number. “I definitely felt the pressure tonight re-creating this iconic dance with @bindisueirwin . What an incredibly special night. It’s a moment that I [...] Bindi Irwin and Derek Hough Slay the Dirty Dancing Lift! 00:37 Bindi Irwin and Derek Hough gave it their all, with their Dirty Dancing number on Dancing With the Stars, and it paid off! The pair received perfect 10s across the board from all four judges and were praised on how flawless their routine was. The infamous lift was what everyone was waiting for and...
